Package main

Class Athlete

java.lang.Object
main.Athlete
public class Athlete extends Object
This is the Athlete class which represents a single Athlete. The class Athletes can be bought and sold to make a Team.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static enum 
    Athlete.POSITION
    Enum to represent the possible player positions.
    static enum 
    Athlete.STATS
    Enum to represent the player stats: Offence, Defence, Stamina, Agility, Current Stamina.

    • changeStat

      public void changeStat(int value, Athlete.STATS stat)
      Changes a certain stat of the Athlete. Used when consuming Items or playing a match.
      Parameters:
      value - The amount to change the stat by.
      stat - The stat to change.

    • isInjured

      public boolean isInjured()
      Checks if the Athlete is injured. If the current stamina of the Athlete is 0, increment injuries by 1.
      Returns:
      true if the Athlete is injured, false otherwise.
